name: Spaceship Power Management Simulator 2077
description:
You're the Power Engineer on board a state of the art space ship in the year 2077. Your job is to survive in the mine field in Alien territory, but you forgot to bring a power board so you can only plug one thing at a time! 

Find more power plugs so you can plug more things in, and unlock more abilities. 

HOW TO PLAY:

The game uses Mouse controls only. 

The ship's modules require power to work. Click on a power node and drag a wire over to one of the ship's component nodes to power that component module. 

Game Project for GMTK Game Jam 2021 by Arvz, with contributions from Tom/Honourity
